DescribeExecution.title: DescribeExecution
DescribeExecution.summary: Queries an execution in a flow. The long polling mode is supported. The maximum waiting period for long polling depends on the value of the WaitTimeSeconds parameter.

DescribeFlow.title: DescribeFlow
DescribeFlow.summary: Queries the information about a flow.

DescribeSchedule.title: DescribeSchedule
DescribeSchedule.summary: Queries the detailed information about a time-based schedule.

GetExecutionHistory.title: GetExecutionHistory
GetExecutionHistory.summary: Queries the details about each step in an execution process.

ListExecutions.title: ListExecutions
ListExecutions.summary: Queries all historical executions of a flow.

ListSchedules.title: ListSchedules
ListSchedules.summary: Queries time-based schedules in a flow.

StartExecution.title: StartExecution
StartExecution.summary: Starts the execution of a workflow.

StartSyncExecution.title: StartSyncExecution
StartSyncExecution.summary: Synchronously starts an execution in a flow.

StopExecution.title: StopExecution
StopExecution.summary: Stops an execution that is in progress in a flow.
